sense.gloss: out of one's line, out of one's field

sdata.j: ↑畑違↑↓|はたけちが↓い|の↑事↑↓こと↓はしない↑方↑↓ほう↓がいい。
sdata.e: It is better not to go out of your field.

sdata.j: ↑畑違↑↓|はたけちが↓い|の↑人↑↓ひと↓の↑話↑↓はなし↓も↑面白↑↓おもしろ↓い。
sdata.e: It is interesting to hear from someone in a different field.

sdata.j: ↑畑違↑↓|はたけちが↓い|の↑品質↑↓ひんしつ↓↑管理↑↓かんり↓↑課↑↓か↓は↑如何↑↓どう↓ですか？
sdata.e: How are you finding the Quality Control department?
